QUESTION: Question
TITLE: Title
NICKNAME_INFO: Your nickname must be at least 3 characters, it will be displayed when you join a quiz.
NICKNAME_ALREADY_USED_INFO: Your nickname is already used by someone else, please change it just for now.
INTRO_START: In a few seconds you will be able to create, share and play quizzes easily!
SETUP_PROFILE_START: But first let's setup your profile!
CHOSE_NICKNAME: Choose your avatar and a nickname, that's it!
INVALID_QR_CODE_INFO: The scanned QR code is not valid, please try again with a valid QuizPad QR code.
INVALID_SCANNER_INFO: Please check that you allowed camera access.
ERROR_CREATING_CATEGORY_INFO: Category name must be more than 3 characters long and should not already exist.
DELETE_CATEGORY_INFO: Deleting the category will also delete all contained questions.
ERROR_DELETING_CATEGORY_INFO: It is impossible to delete the only existing category.
TIMES_TO_SHOW_ADVANCED_SETTINGS: more times to show advanced settings.
LOG_IN_INFO: An online account allows you to create quizs together with others and to keep them synchronised between all your devices.
auth/email-already-in-use: Your email address is already registered, please login or reset your password.
auth/invalid-email: Your email address is not valid, please use a valid email address.
auth/operation-not-allowed: Creating an account with email is not allowed.
auth/weak-password: Your password is too weak, please choose a safer password.
auth/user-disabled: User has been disabled, contact us for more informations.
auth/user-not-found: User not found, have you already signed in?
RESET_PASSWORD_INFO: You will recive an email allowing you to choose a new password.
RESET_PASSWORD_INFO_SHORT: An email will be sent to you
LOG_OUT_INFO: Log out and use QuizPad offline only
DELETE_ACCOUNT_INFO: All your online datas will be deleted
DELETE_ACCOUNT_CONFIRMATION: Your online account has been deleted.
